source_caption_data.pre_caption: This video is a scenery shot that slowly zooms in on the upper floors of a large, multi-story brick building. The building features classic architecture with numerous windows set against a clear, pale blue sky. The shot provides a detailed, low-angle view of the building's corner facade.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This video is a scenery shot that slowly zooms in on the upper floors of a large, multi-story brick building. The building features classic architecture with numerous windows set against a clear, pale blue sky. The shot provides a detailed, low-angle view of the building's corner facade.

generated_critique: The caption should mention that a group of people walks past the building’s entrance during the zoom-in, as this is an important motion detail that helps clarify the scene’s activity.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This video is a scenery shot that slowly zooms in on the upper floors of a large, multi-story brick building. The building features classic architecture with numerous windows set against a clear, pale blue sky. As the camera zooms in, a group of people walks past the building’s entrance, adding an important motion detail to the scene. The shot provides a detailed, low-angle view of the building's corner facade.
